songs.title: Wherever You Are
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
It was a summer night
The stars were all aligned
You, you, you, you showed up and blew my mind
We didn't sleep at all
Played records all night long
That, that, that night, I kind of fell in love

[Pre-Chorus]
Something in your kiss made my body electric
And you set me free
That night brought to life all the magic that's inside
Of you and me

[Chorus]
Wherever you are, you are forever on my mind
Wherever you are, know that our love will never die
Wherever you are
Wherever you are
Love will never die
Wherever you are
Wherever you are

[Verse 2]
Electric warrior love
The sun was coming up
Red, red, red wine and whiskey on your tongue
Tangled up in your sheets
You saw the real me
You, you, you, you give me something to believe

[Pre-Chorus]
Something in your kiss made my body electric
And you set me free
That night brought to life all the magic that's inside
Of you and me

[Chorus]
Wherever you are, you are forever on my mind
Wherever you are, know that our love will never die
Wherever you are
Wherever you are
Love will never die
Wherever you are
Wherever you are
Wherever you are
Wherever you are

[Bridge]
Nothing lasts forever
But I will always remember those nights we spent together
Wherever, wherever

[Chorus]
Wherever you are
Wherever you are
Love will never die
Wherever you are (Wherever you are)
Wherever you are

Wherever, wherever
Love will never die
Wherever you are
